    JsonPipeline
    JsonPipeline.addCachePoint(CacheStrategy strategy)

  • Uses of CacheStrategy in io.wcm.caravan.pipeline.cache

    Methods in io.wcm.caravan.pipeline.cache that return CacheStrategy
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    static CacheStrategy
    CacheStrategies.noCache()
    No caching.
    static CacheStrategy
    CacheStrategies.nonTransientAndTimeToIdle(int duration, TimeUnit unit)
    Invalidate item after a time-to-idle interval: The content is considered immutable, and storage time will be extended to specified value on each get operation on this item, so it is kept in cache as long as it is requested.
    static CacheStrategy
    CacheStrategies.temporary(int duration, TimeUnit unit)
    Stores items only in the local, non-persistent CacheAdapter for the given maximum duration.
    static CacheStrategy
    CacheStrategies.timeToIdle(int duration, TimeUnit unit)
    Invalidate item after a time-to-idle interval: The content is considered immutable, and storage time will be extended to specified value on each get operation on this item, so it is kept in cache as long as it is requested
    static CacheStrategy
    CacheStrategies.timeToLive(int duration, TimeUnit unit)
    Invalidate item after a fixed time-to-live interval, using the same duration as storage time and revalidation-interval
